title: Stocks, Bonds Rise on Growing Fed-Cut Bets
description: US equity futures and bonds rise on increasing bets on the pace of rate cuts ahead of the jobs report. President Trump asked the US Supreme Court to uphold his global tariffs. European leaders meet with Ukraine President Zelenskiy to discuss security guarantees for the country. James Athey of Marlborough discusses his outlook for the Fed's rate decision. Stephanie Guild of Robinhood sees opportunities in stocks beyond the Magnificent Seven. (Source: Bloomberg)
